---
title: "FigS3_Complex_heatmap"
author: "Qiuyun Yang"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

library(ComplexHeatmap)

i = 1
pathway.union <- union(cc.list[[i]]@netP$pathways, cc.list[[i+1]]@netP$pathways)
ht1 = netAnalysis_signalingRole_heatmap(cc.list[[i]], pattern = "outgoing", signaling = pathway.union, title = names(cc.list)[i], width = 5, height = 6, color.heatmap = "OrRd")
ht2 = netAnalysis_signalingRole_heatmap(cc.list[[i+1]], pattern = "outgoing", signaling = pathway.union, title = names(cc.list)[i+1], width = 5, height = 6, color.heatmap = "OrRd")
draw(ht1 + ht2, ht_gap = unit(0.5, "cm"))

ht1 = netAnalysis_signalingRole_heatmap(cc.list[[i]], pattern = "incoming", signaling = pathway.union, title = names(cc.list)[i], width = 5, height = 6, color.heatmap = "GnBu")
ht2 = netAnalysis_signalingRole_heatmap(cc.list[[i+1]], pattern = "incoming", signaling = pathway.union, title = names(cc.list)[i+1], width = 5, height = 6, color.heatmap = "GnBu")
draw(ht1 + ht2, ht_gap = unit(0.5, "cm"))
